author: Margaret Smith
message: The right way is not always the popular and easy way. Standing for right when it is unpopular is a true test of moral character.
title: Thought of the day

author: Frederick Douglass
message: I prefer to be true to myself, even at the hazard of incurring the ridicule of others, rather than to be false, and to incur my own abhorrence.
title: Thought of the day

author: Helen Keller
message: No pessimist ever discovered the secrets of the stars, or sailed to an uncharted land, or opened a new heaven to the human spirit.
title: Thought of the day

author: Marcus Aurelius
message: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
title: Thought of the day
